setPreStageDoneDirectory

public static void setPreStageDoneDirectory(String location)
                                     throws Exception
Sets the (local) directory where the pre stage done files will be written to. If the directory doesn't exists, it will be created. If it does exists, but it isn't a directory an Exception will be thrown. This method can only be invoked once. The user has to delete the pre stage done files itself.

Parameters:
location -
Throws:
Exception
